comment: Very user-friendly and easy to use. Also very competent and engaging Support.

Hi there, I just requested a demo, but I'm really after some price indication and compliance information in regards to user data collection of those leaving feedback - I'm asking this on behalf of a public service organisation in the UK (Transport for London / tfl.gov.uk ) Kind regards, Elmer Zinkhann
It would be super useful to have a 'preview' option directly from the hamburger dots menu. Now I have to go into Edit mode to see what the survey looks like
I would like an easy way to respond to the user's feedback. It seems you used to provide this, but now I don't see how to quickly reply without copying the email address and opening my email client.
I’m struggling to view all the feedback, and a message appears saying that the page doesn’t exist
